mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `stock_score_strategy` ( `id` bigint(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'id', `strategy_id` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '策略id', `strategy_name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '策略名称', `strategy_desc` text COMMENT '策略描述', `detail` longtext COMMENT '详情', `update_date` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `strategy_id` (`strategy_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
